attributes.action: insist that motion dectector light switches are fitted to all office premises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As you go into any major town or city at night you'll notice that there are huge empty buildings all with their lights on. Motion detector light switches are not only a green option they could save a small fortune on the buildings owners energy bill and cut their CO2 output. The switches work by automatically switching off the lights if there has been no movement in the office for a set amount of time. Say 20 minutes. Switching off the lights will also reduce light pollution and for once in my life I maybe able to see the stars in a city. Wouldn't that be beautiful?
